value.title: StarCraft 2: EPIC GAME - Maru's Hero Battlecruisers!
value.excerpt: Maru versus Cure in an epic game of professional StarCraft 2. In this Terran versus Terran we have the game go the distance, as both players decide to go for a wildly different strategy. Easily one of the best games of top-level South Korean TvT that has been played.  Support my work on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/lowkotv
